attributes.action: Change the working week to 30 hours full time
attributes.additional_details: reduce full time hours from 37.5 hours to 30 hours per week
attributes.background: Establish full time hours as 30 hours per week instead of 37.5 hours with no penalty on pay.

rejection.details: There is no legal minimum when deciding what constitutes "full time hours". It is up to individual employers to decide what is classed as a full or part time contract.
